content: arthouse beanie is an adventurous advanced beginner level 70 s inspired beanie that can be made as a snug skull-cap or roomy or slouchy beanie made from basic stitches using worsted weight yarn it works up very quickly the design is yarn-sparing and a great way to stash bust warm but breathable in wool or acrylic for winter this makes a great hiking beanie cute in cotton as a fitted skull-cap for spring perfect for those cooler autumn days also especially when made up in rich autumn colour s use one colour multiple colours including ombre for different effects the ravelry pattern pdf includes flower motif instructions and instructions for multiple brim options from beginner to intermediate the basic beanie instructions and simple brim are available for free on my blog thanks to the following testers for your efforts to test this beanie design margaret richards @snazzycuddles on ig belle9657 on ravelry tania barry @shewgirl1 on ig shewgirl on ravelry laurie vanostrand mnlaurie on ravelry helen maud @helen nanna made on ig gayle surprise auntknittie on ravelry barbara bowman @barbscraftycrochet on fb barbbowman on ravelry richelle cricks @richellecricks on ig richelle362 on ravelry heidi hirnich @handmadeheavenau on ig handmadeheavenaus on etsy please remember to spam me #arthousebeanie @thecrochetfix on social media with your finished projects and add your projects to ravelry - thanks
